snippet.title: Truck explodes on Brisbane M1 at Loganholme, nearby businesses asked to evacuate
snippet.content: A truck carrying chemicals has exploded and burst into flames on the M1 at Loganholme, south of Brisbane. Police said the tanker was near the southbound exit of the motorway, opposite the Logan Hyperdome. Authorities are advising nearby businesses to evacuate and emergency crews are arriving on scene. Paramedics are yet to confirm any injuries. More to come.
